summary.para: The TS_TEXTCHANGE structure contains text change data.

remarks.para: The possible text changes include insert, delete, and replace. For example, if you replace the first "t" of "text" with "T", acpStart =0, acpOldEnd =1, and acpNewEnd =1. If you delete the last "t", acpStart =3, acpOldEnd =4, and acpNewEnd =3. If an "a" is inserted between "e" and "x", acpStart =2, acpOldEnd =2, and acpNewEnd =3.

summary.para: Contains the starting character position of the change.
Contains the ending character position before the text is changed.
Contains the ending character position after the text is changed.
